task: Fix Maya's Complete Journey Desktop Layout Overlap Issue

Potential content overflow with strict width constraints

Updated panel widths from 'w-1/2' to 'w-[calc(50%-0.25rem)]' to account for gap
Maintained flex-shrink-0 to prevent panel compression

additions: Added container queries for responsive layout
Implemented overflow protection with word-wrap and hyphens
Added min-width: 0 to prevent flex item overflow
Created reusable classes for Maya journey layouts

testing_checklist: ✓ Long text properly wraps within panels

steps: 2. Restart dev server: npm run dev:clean
4. Verify no regressions in mobile view

details: CSS calc() has negligible performance impact
